title: New: Noble Oak – Thea/Vilde
content:
Seriously, Noble Oak is the most underrated musician in the world at this moment in time.

Having witnessed his development, from his very first recordings, through to more polished and assured compositions, there’s a jealous part of me that wants his music to remain as a bloggers secret, however with each and every release, the chances of that are growing slimmer and slimmer. With Thea/Vilde, his first new material in seven months, he continues to grow into his own sound, one that’s poignant and beautiful in equal measures. Play this to your girlfriend / boyfriend / mom / dad… fuck it, just play it to everyone you know.

‘if i could look into your eyes i would’

Thea/Vilde is the first taster from Noble Oak’s forthcoming EP, Away, due out later this year.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
